item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, December 12, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Gukesh becomes the youngest chess world champion in history (302 points | 116 comments)
2. Fermat's Last Theorem – how it's going (59 points | 23 comments)
3. Timemap.org – Interactive Map of History (386 points | 85 comments)
4. Show HN: Quantus – LeetCode for Financial Modeling (76 points | 14 comments)
5. How a middle schooler found a new compound in a piece of goose poop (47 points | 16 comments)
6. FCC opens entire 6 GHz band to low power device operations (653 points | 241 comments)
7. BlenderGPT (89 points | 64 comments)
8. Gemini 2.0: our new AI model for the agentic era (886 points | 444 comments)
9. Mysterious New Jersey drone sightings prompt call for 'state of emergency' (377 points | 626 comments)
10. Programming Language Memory Models (2021) (3 points | 1 comment)
11. How a simple math error sparked a panic about black plastic kitchen utensils (12 points | 1 comment)
12. Ham Radio All-in-One-Cable (181 points | 34 comments)
13. Infracost (YC W21) Is Hiring a Founding Solutions Engineer (Remote) ( | hide)
14. QEMU with VirtIO GPU Vulkan Support (225 points | 47 comments)
15. Review of Mullvad VPN (407 points | 157 comments)
16. OnlyFans models are using AI impersonators to keep up with their DMs (317 points | 446 comments)
17. The Marvelous Disappearing Capacitor (58 points | 7 comments)
18. Dear OAuth Providers (327 points | 95 comments)
19. The Cold Email Handbook (281 points | 163 comments)
20. The GPU is not always faster (181 points | 90 comments)
21. Evolving my ergonomic setup (or, my laptop with extra steps) (163 points | 93 comments)
22. Launch HN: Azalea Robotics (YC S24) – Baggage-handling robots for airports (118 points | 69 comments)
23. 2400 phone providers may be shut down by the FCC for failing to stop robocalls (412 points | 252 comments)
24. WPEngine, Inc. vs. Automattic– Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction (393 points | 170 comments)
25. Dioxus 0.6 – Crossplatform apps with Rust (262 points | 106 comments)
26. Mouseless – fast mouse control with the keyboard (46 points | 22 comments)
27. Can hunters' donations help deliver high-quality meat to Colorado food pantries? (16 points | 36 comments)
28. Tricking c64 basic into clearing a hi-res screen quickly (56 points | 15 comments)
29. Geometry clipmaps: simple terrain rendering with level of detail (2017) (28 points | 1 comment)
30. RISC-V HiFive Premier P550 Development Boards with Ubuntu Now Available (160 points | 80 comments)
